data.title: Battle of the Network Stars/February 28, 1977
data.meta_description: This edition aired under the title Challenge of the Network Stars. This edition's co-host was Bruce Jenner. Kaplan, Savalas and Conrad were invited to captain their network's team for a second time.
data.text:
This edition aired under the title Challenge of the Network Stars.

This edition's co-host was Bruce Jenner.

ABC Team (2nd place) CBS Team (3rd place) NBC Team (Winner) Gabe Kaplan (captain) Welcome Back, Kotter Telly Savalas (captain) Kojak Robert Conrad (captain) Baa Baa Black Sheep LeVar Burton Roots Sonny Bono Sonny & Cher Elizabeth Allen C.P.O. Sharkey Darleen Carr The Streets of San Francisco Kevin Dobson Kojak Lynda Day George Once An Eagle Richard Hatch Mike Farrell M*A*S*H Carl Franklin The Fantastic Journey Lawrence Hilton-Jacobs Welcome Back, Kotter David Groh Rhoda Karen Grassle Little House on the Prairie Ron Howard Happy Days Linda Lavin Alice Dan Haggerty The Life and Times of Grizzly Adams Hal Linden Barney Miller Lee Meriwether Barnaby Jones Art Hindle Kingston: Confidential Kristy McNichol Family Rob Reiner All in the Family Kurt Russell The Wonderful World of Disney Penny Marshall Laverne & Shirley Loretta Swit M*A*S*H Jane Seymour 7th Avenue Jaclyn Smith Charlie's Angels Marcia Wallace The Bob Newhart Show W. K. Stratton Baa Baa Black Sheep

Kaplan, Savalas and Conrad were invited to captain their network's team for a second time.
